GSD.product_version: versions from v4.7 to before v5.10.137
GSD.description:
mfd: max77620: Fix refcount leak in max77620_initialise_fps

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.137 by commit afdbadbf18c19779d7bc5df70d872924f9bbd76b, it was introduced in version v4.7 by commit 327156c593600e0f08575621c2a56f311d482e7a. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: mfd: max77620: Fix refcount leak in max77620_initialise_fps
